OOC: I assume that the maximal base is on the southern tip of Africa; That's 
what it was in the map on nbwrpg.com. However, a previous post revealing a 
base in Australia has confused me, because it certainly wasn't on the 
(apparently obsolete) world map.

On Tuesday 21 August 2001 01:38, Robin Kirkman wrote:
> Recieving no reply, VorbIss transformed to beast mode, and started running
> south, heading unwittingly toward the maximal base.
>
